articles.title: Google shows off the Pixel 8 and Pixel Watch 2 ahead of launch - Ars Technica
articles.description: After a few leaks, Google just went ahead and made these devices official.
articles.content:
33 with
  • Google's official Pixel 8 Pro image.
  • This is all you get for the front of the Pixel 8 Pro, but it confirms the sides of the display aren't curved.
